wikipedia_page.main: Beriah Melbourne Gwynne Thomas (11 June 1896 – 23 June 1966) was a Welsh international rugby union player. He played club rugby several teams including Bridgend, St. Batholomew's Hospital, London Welsh and Cardiff. At international level he represented Wales on six occasions.

response: *23 June – Melbourne Thomas, rugby player, 70Melbourne Thomas player profiles Scrum.com
* Melbourne Thomas, Wales rugby union international. Played six times for Wales between 1919 and 1923
* Melbourne Thomas, (Bridgend, St. Bats), Wales, 6 caps 1919–1924
